p: In Table 7 , compounds 54– 72 showed significant antiviral activity against CoV replication in vitro with IC 50 ≤ 10 μM. Although GL and its derivatives ( 51– 53) exhibited less inhibitory activity with IC 50 values ranging from 35 to 365 μM, their cytotoxicity was much lower with CC 50 values ranging from 1462 to 24 000 μM. The detailed mechanism(s) of action of these compounds needs to be investigated further to better target SARS-CoV-2.
